at.sms.business.sdk.exception

  • Classes in at.sms.business.sdk.exception used by at.sms.business.sdk.client 
    Class and Description
    ApiException
    Is thrown when connection and authorization was successful, but the request invalididates program-logic on the server, so it returned an error-code for evaluating.
    AuthorizationFailedException
    Is thrown when the authorization of the username or password failed.
    HttpConnectionException
    Is thrown when a discrepancy regarding to successfull request (200 OK) happens, while connecting to the server, this might range from a simple no connection could be established to a server returned http-error-code.
    ParameterValidationException
    Is thrown when a parameter seems invalid, this also happens when mandatory parameters weren't set.
